Headline: #87 87th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Kedzie/87th
ShortDescription: Westbound 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Kedzie, 79th, Columbus and 87th due to street blockage near Kedzie/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Kedzie, 79th, Columbus and 87th due to street blockage near Kedzie/87th.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
